alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 1:25PM CST until January 18 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Pickens and Sumter Counties. .Widespread rainfall of 2 inches or more has occurred since Friday over the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 117.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 122.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
